title: Sequence annotation front end display error
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

<!-- Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System:centos7
*   Python Version Used:python3.8
*   When you install doccano:2022.10.18
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc):pip

有时会发现在前端标注过的标签未显示出来。一般出现在当前页面标签较多，或同一段文本标注多个标签时。一般情况使用F5刷新一下就可以解决，但有时刷新后依然未显示出来。

Sometimes you will find that the labels annotated in the front end are not displayed. This parameter is usually displayed when there are many tags on the current page or when multiple tags are labeled in the same text. Generally, F5 can be used to refresh the problem, but sometimes it still does not show up.

F5 to refresh before
![微信图片_20221020191847](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30197596/196934926-62443283-de3e-442e-bbed-7d88d4f43369.jpg)

After the F5 to refresh
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30197596/196935542-9459eba0-09d2-4ebd-97c8-15de97d64c3e.png)
